text: Photograph of the Colorado River entering Mojave Canyon, San Bernardino County, California, 1900–1950 The Mohave Canyon is located on the Colorado River, south of Needles, California. It is part of Topock Gorge, a mountainous canyon and gorge section of the Colorado River located between Interstate 40 and Lake Havasu. ==References== Category:Colorado River Category:Landforms of San Bernardino County, California
title: Mohave Canyon
